page.title: 06Industrial Site, Exning
page.content: There are branches of two national companies on this site. The factories have been built for 10 years. {Firmin-Coates}is a warehouse which stores chemicals. They are then sent on the good road links to East Anglia (A11, A45) and to the South East(M11). {Fairclough Engineering}design roads, bridges and tunnels all over the world. All their employees have university degrees and use a lot of technical equipment. {Employees.}There are 60 people employed altogether on this site, who live within 10 miles. They nearly all said that they enjoy the variety of their work. They rarely have to take any of their work home.
